title.en: A Prayer for Quelling the Fear of Diseases

text.en: May everyillnessthat preys on sentient beings’ minds
text.en-trans: lé dang lobur kyen lé gyurpa yi

text.en: Caused by karma and incidental conditions,
text.en-trans: dön dang né dang jungpö tsewa sok

text.en: Be it attacks by dark forces, disease or elemental spirits,
text.en-trans: semchen yi midewé né nam kün

text.en: Never occur anywhere throughout this world!
text.en-trans: jikten kham su jungwar magyur chik

text.en: May all thesufferingof diseases that snatch life away,
text.en-trans: jitar shemé tripé seja zhin

text.en: Tearing body and mind apart in an instant,
text.en-trans: kechik chik la lü sem dral jepé

text.en: Like the executioner who’s dragged his victim to their death,
text.en-trans: sok trok né kyi dukngal jinyé pa

text.en: Never occur anywhere throughout this world!
text.en-trans: jikten kham su jungwar magyur chik

text.en: Mayepidemics, be they short-lived or enduring,
text.en-trans: chidak shen jé kha nang tsüpa tar

text.en: The very names of which strike terror equal
text.en-trans: né kyi ming tsam töpé trak jepé

text.en: To that of falling into the jaws of Yama, Lord of Death,
text.en-trans: nyin chikpa dang takpé rim sok kyi

text.en: Never cause harm to any living beings.
text.en-trans: lüchen kün la nöpar magyur chik

text.en: May eighty thousand classes of harmful obstructers,
text.en-trans: nöpé gek rik tongtrak gyechu dang

text.en: Three hundred and sixty spirits who strike without warning,
text.en-trans: lobur yé drok sumgya druk chu dang

text.en: Four hundred and four types of disease and more,
text.en-trans: zhigya tsa zhi né lasokpa yi

text.en: Never cause harm to any living beings.
text.en-trans: lüchen kün la tsewar magyur chik

text.en: May all the sufferings due to turmoil in the four elements,
text.en-trans: lü sem dewa malü trok jepé

text.en: That strip body and mind of every trace of well-being,
text.en-trans: jung zhi trukpé dukngal jinyé pa

text.en: Be eliminated, granting us radiance, strength, and a long life,
text.en-trans: malü zhi zhing dang tob denpa dang

text.en: Free from sickness, and endowed with inner peace and happiness.
text.en-trans: tsering nemé dekyi denpar shok

text.en: Through the compassion of the gurus, Buddha, Dharma and Saṅgha,
text.en-trans: lama könchok sum gyi tukjé dang

text.en: The power of ḍākinīs, Dharma protectors and guardians,
text.en-trans: khandro chökyong sungmé nütu dang

text.en: And the strength of the unfailing truth of cause and effect,
text.en-trans: lé dré luwa mepé den tob kyi

text.en: Let these prayers of ours be fulfilled, exactly as we wish!
text.en-trans: ngowa mönlam tab tsé drubpar shok
